text: John Craig "Jackie" Robertson (15 July 1928 – 2014) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a striker in the Scottish Football League for Ayr United and East Stirlingshire, and in the Football League for Portsmouth, York City and Barrow. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:People from Aberdeen Category:2014 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Ayr United F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:East Stirlingshire F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players
title: Jackie Robertson
